alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Independence; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Independence, southern Cleburne, northeastern Faulkner and northwestern White Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quitman, or 8 miles southwest of Heber Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Quitman... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Letona... Albion... Hickory Flat... Clay... Wilburn... Dewey... Sidon... Hopewell in Cleburne County... Pearson... Pickens in White County... Dam Site Marina... Eden Isle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas.
